languages.text: "Можешь скрывать свой гнев за фасадом благости сколько угодно, кузен. Да только я вижу тебя насквозь — обиженного, запуганного, потерянного. Не боишься за свой драгоценный Путь, м? Или же вы решили постичь наши искусства?"

traits.locale_text: "Можешь скрывать свой гнев за фасадом благости сколько угодно, кузен. Да только я вижу тебя насквозь — обиженного, запуганного, потерянного. Не боишься за чистоту своей душеньки после подобных выходок? Или, быть может, вы все тут уже решили отправиться в пасть Той, что Жаждет?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "You may hide your anger behind a facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost, and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"
languages.original_text: "Можешь скрывать свой гнев за фасадом благости сколько угодно, кузен. Да только я вижу тебя насквозь — обиженного, запуганного, потерянного. Не боишься за свой драгоценный Путь, м? Или же вы решили постичь наши искусства?"

traits.locale_text: "You may hide your anger behind the facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost and frightened soul. Are you not afraid for your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You may hide your anger behind the facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost and frightened soul. Are you not afraid for your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You may hide your anger behind the facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You may hide your anger behind the facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You may hide your anger behind a facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost, and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You may hide your anger behind a facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost, and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Intenta ocultar tu furia tras una máscara de benevolencia cuanto se te antoje, prima, pero yo veo a través de ella: eres un alma repudiada, perdida y asustada. ¿Es que no te preocupa tu preciada senda, mmm? ¿O es que has decidido por fin estudiar nuestras artes?».
languages.original_text: "You may hide your anger behind a facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost, and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"

traits.locale_text: «Intenta ocultar tu furia tras una máscara de benevolencia cuanto se te antoje, prima, pero yo veo a través de ella: eres un alma repudiada, perdida y asustada. ¿Es que no te preocupa tu preciada senda, mmm? ¿O es que has decidido por fin estudiar nuestras artes?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你竭尽全力，打算把你的愤怒隐藏在仁慈的外表下，我的表亲。但我却能看穿你，我看到了你那沮丧、迷茫而恐惧的灵魂。你就不担心你宝贵的道途走入歧途吗，嗯？还是说，你终于打算学习我们的艺术了？”
languages.original_text: "You may hide your anger behind a facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost, and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"

traits.locale_text: “你竭尽全力，打算把你的愤怒隐藏在仁慈的外表下，我的表亲。但我却能看穿你，我看到了你那沮丧、迷茫而恐惧的灵魂。你就不担心你宝贵的道途走入歧途吗，嗯？还是说，你终于打算学习我们的艺术了？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous pouvez essayer de cacher votre colère derrière un masque de bienveillance, cousin, mais je ne suis pas dupe. Je vois clairement votre âme abattue, perdue et terrifiée. Votre précieuse Voie ne vous préoccupe-t-elle pas ? Ou avez-vous enfin décidé d'étudier nos arts ? »
languages.original_text: "You may hide your anger behind a facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost, and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez essayer de cacher votre colère derrière un masque de bienveillance, cousin, mais je ne suis pas dupe. Je vois clairement votre âme abattue, perdue et terrifiée. Votre précieuse Voie ne vous préoccupe-t-elle pas ? Ou avez-vous enfin décidé d'étudier nos arts ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「怒りを慈悲深さの陰に隠すのは勝手だが、俺にはお前が意気消沈し、迷い、怯えた魂であることが明らかだぞ。大切な道のことを心配していないのか？それとも、ついに我々の技を学ぶ決心をしたのか？」
languages.original_text: "You may hide your anger behind a facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost, and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"

traits.locale_text: 「怒りを慈悲深さの陰に隠すのは勝手だが、俺にはお前が意気消沈し、迷い、怯えた魂であることが明らかだぞ。大切な道のことを心配していないのか？それとも、ついに我々の技を学ぶ決心をしたのか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr könnt Eure Wut hinter der Fassade des Wohlwollens verstecken, so viel Ihr wollt, doch ich durchschaue Euch. Ihr seid eine entmutigte, verlorene und verängstigte Seele. Sorgt Ihr Euch denn gar nicht um Euren geliebten Pfad, hmm? Oder habt Ihr endlich entschieden, unsere Künste zu studieren?"
languages.original_text: "You may hide your anger behind a facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost, and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt Eure Wut hinter der Fassade des Wohlwollens verstecken, so viel Ihr wollt, doch ich durchschaue Euch. Ihr seid eine entmutigte, verlorene und verängstigte Seele. Sorgt Ihr Euch denn gar nicht um Euren geliebten Pfad, hmm? Oder habt Ihr endlich entschieden, unsere Künste zu studieren?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Öfkeni yardımsever görünümünün ardına saklayabilirsin soydaşım ama içinde yatanları görebiliyorum. Kederli, kaybolmuş ve korkmuş hâldesin. Kıymetli Yolun hakkında endişelenmiyor musun bakayım? Yoksa sonunda bizim sanatlarımızı öğrenmeye mi karar verdin?"
languages.original_text: "You may hide your anger behind a facade of benevolence all you want, cousin, except I can see straight through you — a dejected, lost, and frightened soul. Are you not worried about your precious Path, hmm? Or have you decided to study our arts at last?"

traits.locale_text: Öfkeni yardımsever görünümünün ardına saklayabilirsin kuzen ama içinde yatanları görebiliyorum. Kederli, kaybolmuş ve korkmuş bir hâldesin. Kıymetli Yolun hakkında endişelenmiyor musun bakayım? Yoksa sonunda bizim sanatlarımızı öğrenmeye mi karar verdin?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
